Interface MarkovDecisionProcess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MazeMarkovDecisionProcess, SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess

    public interface MarkovDecisionProcess
    A discrete markov decision process
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double GAMMA
      An ok default gamma value
